snippet: It is disheartening to see Joseph Lhota offering an economic plan in the familiar Republican fish-wrap of tax cuts, tax breaks and tax eliminations.
abstract: Editorial expresses disappointment that Joseph Lhota, Republican candidate for mayor of New York City, has offered an economic plan that offers little more than tax cuts, tax breaks and tax eliminations; contends it is hard to see how sweeping tax cuts now are the most responsible and productive thing to do.
lead_paragraph: It is disheartening to see Joseph Lhota offering an economic plan in the familiar Republican fish-wrap of tax cuts, tax breaks and tax eliminations.

headline.main: Tax Cuts in the Mayor’s Race
headline.print_headline: Tax Cuts in the Mayor’s Race
